channel.title: Aoe: 3
channel.description: Anyone play Age of Empires 3? I'm thinking about starting to get back into it.

item.title: Aoe: 3
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

I might go pick it up. It looks pretty cool. I’m going to play a game of AoE 3.

Read full topic

item.title: Aoe: 3
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:13, topic:409114”]We are thinking of two different games, the one im thinking of is by ensemble studios. It has like 6 original civs and 6 other expansion pack civs.

Edit: This is wierd, haven’t kept up with AoE since last year. The new game looks gay.[/quote]The new game is excellent. It’s more like AoE2, which was the best game in the series.

item.title: Aoe: 3
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:8, topic:409114”]So you guys do play AoE online? What civs u guys like the most?[/quote]There are only 2 civs in AoE Online at the moment and out of those two i choose Egyptians. 2 More civs coming this winter.

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:11, topic:409114”]I expect a key in my inbox when I wake.[/quote]Sorry, i have none. Guess you have to wait until release then!

Read full topic

item.title: Aoe: 3
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:5, topic:409114”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=510396.msg3703669#msg3703669 date=1312908147]

I play it and don’t play AoE Online because I am on xp sp 2 fml.

[/quote]Upgrade, it’s worth the effort.

Well I had vista on the machine (but it sucks so I went down to xp, then up to windows 7) Windows 7 I didn’t like so I just bumped back down again. I don’t have sp3 cd. Think ill be able to torrent one?[/quote]um, service packs are free… http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/bb794714
